description: Try our easy to follow Chinese-Style Snapper recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chinese-Style Snapper Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 cm piece ginger, peeled, finely shredded
5 green shallots, trimmed, thinly sliced diagonally

recipeInstructions.text: Combine soy sauce, kecap manis, vinegar and sesame oil in a bowl. Season with salt and white pepper. Set aside. Preheat BBQ hotplate over medium heat.

With a sharp knife, make four diagonal slashes into each side of the fish. Put half of the shallots and ginger into the cavity. Brush fish with oil and place onto BBQ. Cook for 3 minutes on each side or until fish is cooked through. Cook asparagus on the BBQ or in a pan of boiling water until just tender.
Transfer to a large serving platter.
Top with remaining shallot and ginger.
Pour over dressing, sprinkle with fried shallots and serve.
